author: rdonkin
msg: Added constructor which allows the encoding type to be set. Suggested by Kevin Ho.

author: rdonkin
msg: Test cases for betwixt map reading and writing.

author: rdonkin
msg: Added documentation for map reading and writing using betwixt

author: rdonkin
msg: Added bean reader for maps. This allows the standard ooutput of a composite property which is a map to be read back.

author: rdonkin
msg: Updated build so that using a ssh-agent to connect to icarus is supported (by overriding the betwixt.repository project property) when using the latest version of maven.
